boardgame.name: Carcassonne Door Berg en Dal
Carcassonne: Over Hill and Dale
Carcassonne: Par Monts et par Vaux
Carcassonne: Über Stock und Stein
Каркассон. Альпийские луга
boardgame.description: Carcassonne: Over Hill and Dale, a standalone game in the Carcassonne series, allows players to be farmers who care for animals on their large farms and cultivate the fruits and vegetables in their fields._T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;Description from the Z-Man English version product page:_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;They say agriculture is the most noble employment of man, and Carcassonne: Over Hill and Dale wanted to offer players the gratifying feeling of providing for the people. In this new game, towns and castles make room for fields of fruits and vegetables. Collect them all, build stables to house animals, and walk down a hill to make even more points!_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt; The ability to walk a meeple down a path and score more points._T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt; A new setting to enjoy the new mechanic of Carcassonne._T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;
boardgame.boardgamepodcastepisode: #77: Vinhos Deluxe review _T_E_M_P_T_A_G_amp;amp; on tap; Carcassonne: Over Hill and Dale; Alhambra; Cleopatra; Coldwater Crown: The Sea

result.value: Some necessary text - easily memorized or small crib sheet
Moderate in-game text - needs crib sheet or paste ups
Extensive use of text - massive conversion needed to be playable
